properties.name: management.logging.export.enabled
properties.description: Whether auto-configuration of logging is enabled to export logs.

properties.name: management.otlp.logging.compression
properties.description: Method used to compress the payload.

properties.name: management.otlp.logging.connect-timeout
properties.description: Connect timeout for the OTel collector connection.

properties.name: management.otlp.logging.endpoint
properties.description: URL to the OTel collector's HTTP API.

properties.name: management.otlp.logging.export.enabled
properties.description: Whether auto-configuration of logging is enabled to export OTLP logs.

properties.name: management.otlp.logging.headers
properties.description: Custom HTTP headers you want to pass to the collector, for example auth headers.

properties.name: management.otlp.logging.timeout
properties.description: Call timeout for the OTel Collector to process an exported batch of data. This timeout spans the entire call: resolving DNS, connecting, writing the request body, server processing, and reading the response body. If the call requires redirects or retries all must complete within one timeout period.

properties.name: management.otlp.logging.transport
properties.description: Transport used to send the logs.
